name: The Six Number
description:
It is a first person view game.

The player can move around and look around in the room.

The player in a room and have to find out the six numbers to escape/win the game.

There is a formula on the wall that player can get a hint about the six numbers.

On the door, the player can input the numbers.

Creater: Weipeng Weng

E-mail: weng.we@husky.neu.edu
